name: AIA_Classification_CreatePromptName
description: Create prompt name from Classification Model
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!key: ri!ClassificationModel[recordType!AIA Classification Model.key],
  "AIA_Prompt_" & upper(local!key[1]) & right(local!key, len(local!key) - 1)
) & 
a!match(
  value: ri!aiSkillType,
  equals: cons!AIA_AI_SKILL_TYPES[1],
  then: "_doc_classification",
  equals: cons!AIA_AI_SKILL_TYPES[2],
  then: "_email_classification",
  equals: cons!AIA_AI_SKILL_TYPES[3],
  then: "_text_classification",
  equals: cons!AIA_AI_SKILL_TYPES[4],
  then: "_doc_classification_multimodal",
  default: ""
)
